definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The resistance rates of Enterobacter sp. to the third generation cephalosporins were relatively higher.
sentences.chinese: 腸桿菌屬對第三代頭孢菌素的耐藥率較高。

sentences.english: Cetazolin sodium is contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to cephalosporin group of antibiotics.
sentences.chinese: 先鋒5號禁用於已知對頭孢菌素類抗生素過敏的患者。

sentences.english: Lys has no any promoting effect on cephalosporin C fermentation.
sentences.chinese: 賴氨酸對頭孢菌素C發酵可能無任何積極作用。

sentences.english: There were linearity for each of cephalosporins.
sentences.chinese: 並且每一種頭孢菌素都有良好的線性。

sentences.english: The deprotection procedure of phenylacetyl group is the basic way to synthesis many kinds of cephem intermediates.
sentences.chinese: 苯乙酰基的脫除工藝是合成衆多頭孢菌素的基本步驟。
